sentences.sContent: Government officials have denied reports of rebel advances.

sentences.sContent: ...the Royal Society in London said in its report that scientists need to “shift away from a research culture where data is viewed as a private preserve”...

...What does the report say about the Arctic region...
...The report warns the picture on wages is likely to get worse this year despite indications of an economic rebound...
